name: Do You Know My Name?
description:
Within an hour, 25 new words. Why not give it a try?

A language learning game which provides first-person view gameplay was developed to explore the possibility of immersive game-based learning and to offer an entertaining learning environment that motivates Mandarin learners. 

Three topics: numbers, colours, and direction.

Solve puzzles related to elements of Mandarin through gameplay while learning Mandarin in a fun way.

Feel free to comment on how many words you had learn in such a short time and share this effective way of learning Chinese with your friends 😁

Here is the game's cheesy backstory  :)

“There has always been a rumour about an unnamed cursed painting in the Grand Art Museum rumoured that this painting will bring misfortune every hundred years. Only when its name is known will the curse be broken.”

“You are a new security guard at this museum and today is your first day of work. When you are patrolling with your best buddy, a flashlight, you felt dizzy suddenly and then passed out. When you wake up, you find that you don't know where you are. At this moment you can only try your best to get out of here."
